questions.question: You are a student with an A1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 30 words. Describe your family.

answers.answer: I have a big family with my parents, two siblings, and my grandparents. My father is a doctor, my mother is a teacher, and my siblings are students. My grandparents are retired. We live in a house with a garden. We are a close-knit family and we enjoy spending time together.
